summary: A new senior at a boy's prep school, finds himself harassed by the machismo culture of his classmates and the unfeelingly behavior by his father, only being treated with decency by his roommate and with affection by the coach's wife.
cast: Deborah Kerr|John Kerr|Leif Erickson|Edward Andrews|Darryl Hickman|Norma Crane|Dean Jones|Jacqueline deWit|Tom Laughlin|Ralph Votrian|Steven Terrell|Kip King|Jimmy Hayes|Richard Tyler|Don Burnett|Bob Alexander|Paul Bryar|Chuck Courtney|Parker Eggleston|Virginia Eiler|Robert Ellis|Del Erickson|Ron Gans|Sol Gorss|Harry Harvey Jr.|Mary Alan Hokanson|Byron Kane|Mike Lally|Peter Leeds|Tom McKee|Madge Meredith|Gene Merlino|Harold Miller|Peter Miller|Michael Monroe|Norman Ollestad|Ralph Reed|Robert Santon|Bert Stevens|Dale Van Sickel|Chuck Webster|Wilson Wood
keywords: coming of age|based on play|homophobia|dance lesson|college reunion
title: Té y simpatía
